biotools.summary: EPCES (Epitopes ConsEnsus Scoring) is a new antigen Epitope Prediction method from six different scoring functions – residue epitope propensity, conservation score, side-chain energy score, contact number, surface planarity score, and secondary structure composition.

bioschemas.name: EPCES
bioschemas.summary: EPCES (Epitopes ConsEnsus Scoring) is a new antigen Epitope Prediction method from six different scoring functions – residue epitope propensity, conservation score, side-chain energy score, contact number, surface planarity score, and secondary structure composition.
